code: import{useState}from"react";import axios from"axios";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function KMeansPredictor(){const[income,setIncome]=useState("");const[spendingScore,setSpendingScore]=useState("");const[cluster,setCluster]=useState(null);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const[error,setError]=useState(null);const handlePredict=async()=>{setLoading(true);setError(null);try{const response=await axios.post("http://localhost:5000/api/predict",{annual_income:parseFloat(income),spending_score:parseFloat(spendingScore)});setCluster(response.data.cluster);}catch(error){console.error("Prediction error:",error);setError("Failed to connect to the prediction service.
